channel.title: Data Playground
channel.description: Data Playground - A personal development site for Bright.

item.title: Udacity Data Analyst Project 1 - Test a Perceptual Phenomenon
item.description: This is the first project for Udacity Data Analyst. The statistical tests and plotting is done in R markdown.

item.title: Most Tweets by city using Hadoop - Hive
item.description: This is a short example of using twitter data set and location of cities data set, we can find which cities send out the most tweets that day.
